ground_truth.thought: 我打算创业从事互联网金融相关业务。首先，收集10个成功的互联网金融创业案例。然后，了解互联网金融创业所需的资质和手续。接着，获取互联网金融行业的市场调研报告。最后，咨询专业人士关于互联网金融创业的风险评估和应对策略。
ground_truth.name: EntrepreneurshipGuide.get_financial_tech_resources

origin_prompt.content:
你是一个可以使用外部工具的助手。你可以调用以下的工具:
[{'name': 'BINGMap.get_coordinates', 'description': 'Get the coordinates of a location.', 'required_parameters': [{'name': 'location', 'type': 'STRING', 'description': 'the location need to get coordinates.'}], 'optional_parameters': [], 'return_data': [{'name': 'latitude', 'description': 'the latitude of the location.'}, {'name': 'longitude', 'description': 'the longitude of the location.'}]}, {'name': 'GoogleScholar.get_citation_format', 'description': "get APA citation format by an identification of organic result's id", 'required_parameters': [{'name': 'q', 'type': 'STRING', 'description': 'ID of an individual Google Scholar organic search result'}], 'optional_parameters': [], 'return_data': [{'name': 'citation', 'description': 'the citation format of the article'}]}, {'name': 'BINGMap.search_nearby', 'description': 'Search for places nearby a location, within a given radius, and return the results into a list. Put the location name at the end of the query.', 'required_parameters': [{'name': 'search_term', 'type': 'STRING', 'description': 'the place name'}], 'optional_parameters': [{'name': 'places', 'type': 'STRING', 'description': 'the name of the location.'}, {'name': 'latitude', 'type': 'FLOAT', 'description': 'the latitude of the location.'}, {'name': 'longitude', 'type': 'FLOAT', 'description': 'the longitude of the location.'}, {'name': 'radius', 'type': 'NUMBER', 'description': 'radius in meters.'}], 'return_data': [{'name': 'places', 'description': 'the list of places, each place is a dict with name and address, at most 5 places.'}]}, {'name': 'PolygonFinance.get_ticker_detail', 'description': 'Get a single ticker supported by Polygon.io, with detailed information about the ticker and the company behind it', 'required_parameters': [{'name': 'ticker', 'type': 'STRING', 'description': ''}], 'optional_parameters': [], 'return_data': [{'name': 'address', 'description': 'company address'}, {'name': 'homepage_url', 'description': ''}, {'name': 'description', 'description': 'A description of the company and what they do/offer'}, {'name': 'list_date', 'description': 'The date that the symbol was first publicly listed'}, {'name': 'name', 'description': 'The name of the asset'}]}, {'name': 'PolygonFinance.search_stock_ticker', 'description': 'get the stock ticker given the company name', 'required_parameters': [{'name': 'search', 'type': 'STRING', 'description': 'search for terms within the ticker and/or company name'}], 'optional_parameters': [], 'return_data': [{'name': 'ticker', 'description': 'The exchange symbol that this item is traded under'}, {'name': 'name', 'description': 'The name of the asset'}]}, {'name': 'EntrepreneurshipGuide.get_financial_tech_resources', 'description': 'Collect resources for starting a fintech business, including successful case studies, required qualifications, market research reports, and risk assessment strategies.', 'required_parameters': [{'name': 'q', 'type': 'STRING', 'description': 'The type of financial technology resources to gather'}], 'optional_parameters': [], 'return_data': [{'name': 'case_studies', 'description': 'A list of successful fintech startup case studies'}, {'name': 'qualifications', 'description': 'A list of required qualifications and procedures for starting a fintech business'}, {'name': 'market_research', 'description': 'A market research report on the fintech industry'}, {'name': 'risk_assessment', 'description': 'A risk assessment and strategy consultation for starting a fintech business'}]}]
如果你已经知道答案，请调用FinishAction来提供最终的回复。

prediction: 当前这一步的目标是收集和整理互联网金融创业所需的信息，包括成功的创业案例、所需的资质和手续、市场调研报告以及风险评估和应对策略。这将帮助您更好地了解互联网金融行业，为创业做好准备。
